parameter.name: fullName
parameter.shortdesc: The full path name of the new book file, including the book file extension '.indb'.

parameter.name: withProperties
parameter.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new Book &#40;Optional)

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the Book.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the Book with the specified index or name.

parameter.name: index
parameter.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the Book with the specified name.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the Books within the specified range.

parameter.name: from
parameter.shortdesc: The Book, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: Book, Long Integer or String.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The Book, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: Book, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first Book in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last Book in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle Book in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the Book with the index previous to the specified index.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The index of the Book that follows the desired Book.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the Book whose index follows the specified Book in the collection.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The Book whose index comes before the desired Book.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any Book in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every Book in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Book.
Returns the Book with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
